body.name: ZINUS Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame / Mattress Foundation with Steel Slat Support / No Box Spring Needed / Easy Assembly, King, Black

features: GO MINIMALIST - Less is more, especially with this modern and boldly outlined foundation that lends both strength and understated sophistication to your bedroom - two qualities that never go out of style
NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Reliable metal slats are designed to support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring

RECESSED LEGS AND UNDER BED STORAGE SPACE - A 14 inch platform features recessed side legs for even better support with no stubbed toes, and its 12 inches of under bed space is perfect for storing extra odds and ends

EASY ASSEMBLY - Metal slats are secured with fewer bolts to save you time and hassle; all parts, tools and instructions are shipped straight to your door in one efficiently packed box; set-up takes less than hour with a friend’s help
Worry-free 5 year limited warranty included; mattress sold separately; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 700 lbs
body.description: Think that a bed that comes in the mail has to make you tear your hair out before it can be put together? The Abel Metal Platform Bed might make you think again. We’ve figured out a simpler way to construct a bed frame via this design’s Quick Lock assembly system. Because this frame features a set of thick steel support slats that can be snapped into place in no time, giving you a sound foundation that’s ready in under an hour. No outside tools or engineering degree required. The result of your hard (ish) work? A sleek and uncompromisingly stable bed that polishes the look of your bedroom, requires no box spring, and even gives you some extra under bed space for storage. And to go with it, we offer a 5-year warranty because we’re in the business of having your back, so you can stay in the business of getting great sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quick, intuitive assembly As much as we love puzzles, we don’t enjoy tedious & confusing assembly instructions. So, we’ve engineered this bed frame to come together with fewer nuts and bolts, and packed it with easy-to-follow instructions so you can spend more time enjoying the big picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars high-quality and affordable option for anyone
reviews.reviewText: The ZINUS Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame is a high-quality and affordable option for anyone who is looking for a sturdy and reliable bed frame. This platform bed frame is made of durable steel that is built to last, and it has a simple and modern design that is sure to complement any bedroom decor.One of the best things about this bed frame is its ease of assembly. It comes with all the necessary tools and hardware, and it can be easily put together in under an hour. The frame is also lightweight and easy to move, which makes it ideal for anyone who likes to rearrange their bedroom furniture frequently.The ZINUS Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame is also incredibly sturdy. It has a weight capacity of up to 500 pounds, which means it can easily accommodate two people and their mattress without any issues. The frame also has a low profile design that is great for anyone who likes a minimalist and modern look in their bedroom.Another great feature of this bed frame is its affordability. It's an excellent value for the price, especially when compared to other high-end bed frames on the market. The quality of the frame is also impressive, and it provides a stable and comfortable base for any mattress.Overall, the ZINUS Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame is a great product for anyone who wants a sturdy, reliable, and affordable bed frame. Its ease of assembly, durability, and minimalist design make it an excellent choice for any bedroom, and its high weight capacity ensures that it will provide a comfortable and stable base for any mattress for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The ZINUS Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame is an absolute game-changer for my king bed! The support it provides is exceptional, and the steel slat design ensures durability and longevity. This heavy-duty frame gives me confidence that it can withstand the test of time.While assembly involves putting it together piece by piece, the process is surprisingly straightforward. The instructions are clear, and the end result is a sturdy and reliable platform for my mattress. The fact that it eliminates the need for a box spring is a fantastic space-saving feature.In sleek black, the frame also adds a touch of modern elegance to my bedroom. ZINUS has truly nailed it with the Abel Metal Platform Bed Frame – offering a perfect blend of robust construction, easy assembly, and a sleek design. Highly recommended for those seeking a reliable and stylish bed frame!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was easy to assemble, very good directions for a change, and we love the design of the bed frame. No stubbing the toes! Great buy, great price. We recommend this bedframe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bed for the price
reviews.reviewText: This bed was so easy to put together by myself, I probably had it done within 30 minutes. It seems to be good quality and sturdy too. I recently bought a queen split box spring for my old bed and didn’t want to get rid of them so quickly so decided to try them on the bed frame and they fit great with the mattress on top. It’s pretty tall, but I don’t mind; the amount of space to store things underneath makes up for the height. I’m able to stack two under-bed bins, whereas my old bed could barely fit one underneath. I kept my old headboard which just leans against the wall behind it. Overall pretty happy with my purchase and would recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More Solid Than Expected
reviews.reviewText: Earlier this year, I bought a whole new bedroom furniture set. The bed, though very nice otherwise, was not designed properly for fully supporting a box spring. This resulted in the 4 month-old box spring breaking. Now I could have replaced it under warranty through the mattress retailer, but this would just happen again. So I spent hours researching all these different platform frames and ultimately decided on the Zinus Abel. I needed a platform that would fit inside the wood bed frame. I was nervous about ordering it because I wasn't sure if I could trust the advertised dimensions. The dimensions are, however, exactly as advertised.Putting this frame together was really easy. It took me about 45 minutes, but only because I had a small amount of room to work with and had to assemble it inside my wood bed frame (so that I wouldn't have to take it apart) according to a per-rehearsed plan. (That and I accidentally grabbed the wrong legs for the center cross bar, so they didn't touch the floor and I had to switch them out for the correct ones. Oops.) If I were setting it up in the open, or prior to setting up the wood bed frame, it would have gone much faster.The platform is nice and solid, more so than I expected. I was also pleased to see that there is some padding on the center rail to keep the slats from making any noise against it.When I was researching this frame, I of course paid attention to the negative reviews. There is a common theme among them in that most of the people experiencing problems with the legs either have hardwood floors or the platform is standing alone. All beds will move when you use them, even without any "fun stuff." I don't expect that mine will move, as I placed some acoustic foam as shims around each corner of the platform to keep the platform from shifting inside my bed frame. Perhaps others may find it beneficial to secure the platform to minimize the shifting that can cause damage to the legs. The other problem I've seen people have is over-torquing the bolts. It's best to tighten them down until they stop, and then use just a little more pressure to torque them down until they stop again. Never tighten them so much that the rails start to cave in around the bolt heads. Also, take a little clear nail polish and dab it on the ends of the bolt threads...just a dab at the end...and they won't loosen over time but can still be removed normally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy minimalistic and functional
reviews.reviewText: Simple queen size bed frame. Easy to assemble. Has held up really nicely. Currently being used with a heavy memory foam queen mattress. Have had it a few months now without any wobbling or loosening of the fasteners. Has decent space underneath for storage. Good purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A seriously solid, high-quality frame with a ton of room underneath for sliding drawers, boxes, etc. We bought one for the master bedroom and liked it so much, we bought another for the other bedroom. The package came in 3 days, packed perfectly and ready for assembly. All parts come labeled by number, making assembly simple. Great product.

Una excelente opción, es fácil de armar, vienen todas las partes marcadas para su ensamble e incluye las herramientas para el ensamblaje materiales de calidad y con buenos acabados, se siente muy firme y no genera ningún ruido
Fácil de armar, viene con todas las instrucciones y herramientas que necesitas. Queda bastante estable y se ve bien 👌🏻

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to assemble and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Before being delivered, I wasn't hoping anything for the price. I was so much surprised. I'm very critique when it comes to assembling furniture. The packaging is very well made, easy to open and every is well secured. The protecting styrofoam isn't the cheap kind that flakes and gets everywhere.The instructions are very easy to follow. Every parts is numbered so you just have to assemble them in an order. I only needed the instructions to know which length of screw to use and since there is only two sizes, it's very easy to follow. There is some spare screws, no bolts requried. There is your standard hex key plus they included a very nice and powerful hex ratchet. It works very well and I've never seen any company including this kind of tool. It's a must!Even though the instructions recommend two persons to assemble, it's very easy to do it alone. I did it alone in 26 minutes. I didn't have to force anything, everything went smoothly together. No parts warped and the final product is a straight and sturdy frame. They even included 4 lattes with double tape, just have to peel it off and the mattress will never slip off.I would buy again and again in a heart beat. I would recommend anyone to buy it. It looks good and it's the best quality/price I've ever seen for a product.

I was worried about the installation process and sturdiness once installed.The installation process was easy with clear instructions that the package has; you just need to have common sense when you have to add bolts to both corners of the bar; don't do 2 bolts on the same corner and the other 2 after. Just do one bolt without tight it completely and go to the other corner putting the contrary bolt. Do the same with the other, once all put it, thigh all of them. That's the only detail to have in mind. The package comes with a great allen ratchet that makes the work way easier than with a standard allen wrench.Sturdiness is great. No issues after 2 weeks and even moving the bed is easy; not heavy and slides like if it has wheels.Great product. I never wrote a review before, but this one is worth it.

Es bastante resistente y liviana, me gustó que es fácil de armar y venía con unas pegatinas en las varillas del centro para que el colchón no se moviera pero realmente no llegaron en muy buen estado y no pegaban mucho… de lo demás se ve bastante bien en el dormitorio, esencial para quienes les gusta lo minimalista.
